definition: cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke

sentences.english: Dense smoke coming out of No. 4 engine cowling (engine nacelle), fire suspected.
sentences.chinese: 第四号发动机整流罩冒浓烟，可能着火。

sentences.english: Thick dust and smoke rush through downtown Manhattan.
sentences.chinese: 浓烟与灰尘冲过曼哈顿下城的街道。

sentences.english: The factory chimneys puff dense smoke into the air.
sentences.chinese: 工厂的烟囱向空中喷吐着浓烟。

sentences.english: Smoke was rolling up from the burning oil up smoke.
sentences.chinese: 正在燃烧的汽油箱上浓烟滚滚。

sentences.english: The smoke billowed from the burning house.
sentences.chinese: 浓烟从烈焰飞腾的房子里滚滚喷出。

sentences.english: Black smoke belched from the building .
JAKE SEARCHES for Neytiri amid swirling smoke and sparks.
sentences.chinese: 杰克在翻滚的浓烟和火焰中寻找着奈提莉。

sentences.english: Black smoke belched out from the forest fire.
A fireman collapsed from the fumes.
sentences.chinese: 一个救火员被浓烟熏倒了。
几个大烟囱在排出浓烟。

sentences.english: The refinery fire sent a plume of thick black smoke from blazing spherical storage tanks.
sentences.chinese: 从燃烧的炼油厂球形储藏罐中冒出一股黑色的浓烟。

sentences.english: The volcano spurts smoke and lave after 3 years of silence.
sentences.chinese: 平静了三年的火山突然喷出浓烟和熔岩。

sentences.english: Small fires are built on the floor, and the leaves cure in a smoke-laden atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 在地面上生小火使叶子在充满浓烟的环境中调制。

sentences.english: Clouds of smoke and steam filled the air for ever and ever .
sentences.chinese: 空气里长年累月充满着缭绕不绝的浓烟和蒸气。

sentences.english: Smoke was still curling out of shattered third-floor windows.
sentences.chinese: 从三楼破烂的窗口仍不断冒出浓烟向上翻卷。

definition: to catch fire/to cook/to get angry
to discharge smoke/to fume with rage
